org.xbib.elasticsearch.rest.action

Class RestJDBCRiverInduceAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.component.AbstractComponent
      • org.elasticsearch.rest.BaseRestHandler
        • org.xbib.elasticsearch.rest.action.AbstractRestRiverAction
          • org.xbib.elasticsearch.rest.action.RestJDBCRiverInduceAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.elasticsearch.rest.RestHandler

    public class RestJDBCRiverInduceAction
extends AbstractRestRiverAction
    The JDBC River REST inducer. The river can be fired once to run when this move is called from REST.

    Example:
    curl -XPOST 'localhost:9200/_river/my_jdbc_river/_induce'
